sense.gloss: to attach, to join, to connect, to add, to append, to affix, to stick, to glue, to fasten, to sew on, to apply (ointment), to put against
to keep a diary, to make an entry
to allot, to budget, to assign
to follow (someone), to shadow, to tail, to stalk
to produce flowers (of a plant), to produce fruit
to do intensely, to do fiercely, to do strongly
to be used to (doing), to be accustomed to

sdata.j: ↑暗↑↓くら↓くならないうちに、↑目的↑↓もくてき↓↑地↑↓ち↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|ようにバスに↑乗↑↓の↓った。
sdata.e: I took the bus in order to reach the destination before it got dark.

sdata.j: わたしはあなたより↑先↑↓さき↓に↑駅↑↓えき↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|。
sdata.e: I can beat you to the station.

sdata.j: わたしたちはそこに↑定刻↑↓ていこく↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|ようにタクシーに↑乗↑↓の↓った。
sdata.e: We took a taxi so as to reach there on time.

sdata.j: どちらの↑道↑↓みち↓を↑行↑↓おこな↓っても↑駅↑↓えき↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|。
sdata.e: Whichever way you go, you can get to the station.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑老人↑↓ろうじん↓がその↑席↑↓せき↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|ように↑立↑↓た↓ち↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: I got up so an old man could sit in my seat.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓はそこへ↑定刻↑↓ていこく↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|ようにタクシーに↑乗↑↓の↓った。
sdata.e: We took a taxi so as to get there on time.

sdata.j: ↑昼↑↓ひる↓までに↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|と↑思↑↓おも↓う？
sdata.e: Do you think we'll reach his house before noon?

sdata.j: ↑朝↑↓あさ↓↑早↑↓はや↓く↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑出↑↓で↓れば、↑暗↑↓くら↓くならないうちに↑目的↑↓もくてき↓↑地↑↓ち↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|だろう。
sdata.e: Leave home early in the morning, and you will get to your destination before dark.

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑身↑↓み↓に|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|のは↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓だ。
sdata.e: English is not hard to learn.

sdata.j: トムがネクタイを|↑着↑↓つ↓ける|ことってあるの？
sdata.e: Does Tom ever wear a tie?
